```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE)
```

Get San Francisco Bay samples, seee 300

```{r}
sfb<-read_csv("meta/sfb.csv")
sfb %>% select(ID) %>% write_tsv("bamlists/26.names", col_names = FALSE)
sfb %>% select(Path) %>% write_tsv("bamlists/26.bamlist", col_names = FALSE)
```

26 samples

```{sh, eval=FALSE}
srun -t 12:00:00 -p high --mem=32G --nodes=1 --ntasks-per-node=1 --cpus-per-task=12 $HOME/angsd/angsd -nthreads 12 \
-minInd 23 -bam bamlists/26.bamlist -ref /home/maccamp/genomes/longfin-polished/lfs_run3_scaffolds_final.fa \
-rf /home/maccamp/genomes/longfin-polished/1mbseqs.txt \
-out outputs/304/snps-wgs  \
-minMaf 0.05 -minMapQ 20 -minQ 20 -GL 1 -doMajorMinor 1 -doMaf 1 -SNP_pval 1e-6 \
-doGeno 2 -doPost 1 -postCutoff 0.9 -doPlink 2  > outputs/304/snps.out 2> outputs/304/snps.err &
```
